tool_description: Unleash the full potential of your AI image generator with our revolutionary API. Our creative approach allows you to generate beautiful and detailed images, bringing your vision to life like never before. Whether you’re using Dall-e, Midjourney, Stable Diffusion or any other AI image generator, our API seamlessly integrates into your workflow, making it effortless to improve the quality of your images. name: Dalle Prompt Improver
title: Dalle Prompt Improver

api_list.name: /prompts/improvePromptUltra
api_list.description: Generates three new improved prompts from a basic one, selecting the level of creativity desired for them (from 1 to 100). It also allows you to set parameters of the desired final image such as category, style, viewing angle, proximity and lighting.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dalle-prompt-improver3.p.rapidapi.com/prompts/improvePromptUltra"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dalle-prompt-improver3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://dalle-prompt-improver3.p.rapidapi.com/prompts/improvePromptUltra"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dalle-prompt-improver3.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

option1.description: Improved version 1 of the sent prompt.

option2.description: Improved version 2 of the sent prompt.

option3.description: Improved version 3 of the sent prompt.
